ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] groups
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry but THIS I FIND AWFULLY FUNNY. You play on a role playing server and everyone is unfriendly and solos............THAT REALLY is FUNNY. Make a player on
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry but THIS I FIND AWFULLY FUNNY.

You play on a role playing server and everyone is
unfriendly and solos............THAT REALLY is FUNNY.


Make a player on Druzzil Ro, I have several and would
enjoy the company. Feel free to email me offline and
we can set something up.

I find the people on this server for the most part,
nice and willing to group.

A lot of twinkies though....lol

LAter

rlebeau65@...



--- wolf_clawuk <ikestarwolf@...> wrote:
> hello,
>
> just joined you group,
>
>
> im currantly a 13th level Bst on luclin in shadow
> weavers thicket on
> the fironia vie server. (Untwinked)i.e poor and newb
> equipment
>
> im pretty much a newb only been playing a month the
> only other place
> i have travelled is around gfay as an elf. so as
> everyone i meet in
> luclin seems to solo and are pretty much unfriendly
> overall, i would
> like to ask here if anyone would like to group for a
> coupla hours? or
> if anyone can offer advice?
>
> Calidin
> 13th Beast Lord
> Firona Vie Server
